760970.name: Renegade Tabletop Tools System
760970.description:
The Renegade Tabletop Tools System consists of two powerful, but very easy to use tools to aid in tabletop or net-based role-playing sessions.

REBORN: (10/20/21 Overhaul Update)

The REBORN edition of the RTTS is a complete overhaul to the original (legacy) version. It features a GUI (graphical user interface), peaceful music to listen to while you're in the program, and all of the same capabilities of the original.

All previous entity dictionaries you created in the legacy version are compatible by default!

  • Renegade Dice Roller Reborn
    -The Renegade Dice Roller Reborn effectively simulates rolling any number of dice with any number of sides and any modifiers. It is an overhaul of the original (legacy) version and features a GUI (graphical user interface) and has everything in it that the original version did. Free for all users who own the legacy version!

  • Renegade Entity Dictionary Reborn
    -The Renegade Entity Dictionary Reborn allows users to create and edit lists of entities, view lists, save lists as files, load list files, update list files, purge lists, and even retrieve a random entity from a list. It is an overhaul of the original (legacy) version and features a GUI (graphical user interface) and has everything in it that the original version did. Free for all users who own the legacy version!

LEGACY: (Basic command prompt)
  • Renegade Dice Roller System:
    -The Renegade Dice Roller System (RDRS) simply and effectively simulates rolling any number of dice with any number of sides, any modifiers, and will break down the mathematic equation results for you and display them for easy understanding. It also keeps a running total of which dice is being rolled and the grand total of all rolls combined. This can be used as a substitute for the chore of rolling real dice and help speed up combat, determining initiative, large scale battles, and much more!

  • Renegade Entity Dictionary System:
    -The Renegade Entity Dictionary System (REDS) allows users to create and edit lists of entities, view lists, save lists as files, load list files, update list files, purge lists, and even retrieve a random entity from a list. This can be used to create lists of different game elements for nearly any gameplay aspect including loot, adventure, time, weather, location, enemies, and so much more! The sky is the limit!


[/p]

*A tool made by a single developer.*
